description: A list of project definitions for the Buddah site
title: Project definitions

___description.description: The short description of a project

___license.description: The license or licenses under which the project is licensed

items.id: A SPDX license identifier, or a URL to a license if it has no SPDX identifier

___repository.description: The URL at which a project's source code can be found, for example a version control repository or source download host

___keywords.description: A list of keywords for a project

___homepage.description: The URL of a project's homepage, for example a website or Nexus Mods file entry URL
